alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 7:50PM CDT until May 05 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Little River near Tecumseh affecting Seminole and Pottawatomie Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC125-133-051300- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.W.0003.220505T0546Z-220505T1930Z/ /TCMO2.1.ER.220505T0546Z.220505T1200Z.220505T1330Z.NO/ 750 PM CDT Wed May 4 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Tecumseh. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding to depths of 1 foot occurs over croplands... pastures... and rural roads along the river. The area affected is entirely rural... and downstream of Lake Thunderbird... from near Macomb in Pottawatomie County to near Bowlegs in western Seminole County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
